alert.note: Alert for Far South Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued December 17 at 4:41PM EST until December 17 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Isolated minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...Mainland Monroe and Far South Miami-Dade County. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

area.areaDesc: Far South Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe
